mapper.select:
select t1.*, t2.id as flink_artifact_id, t2.project_id as project_id, t2.`type` as flink_artifact_type, t2.`name` as flink_artifact_name, t2.remark as flink_artifact_remark from ws_flink_artifact_cdc t1 join ws_flink_artifact t2 on t1.flink_artifact_id = t2.id where t2.project_id = #{projectId} and t1.current = '1'
and t2.`name` like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
AND t1.flink_version = #{flinkVersion}
order by t2.id desc
